channel.title: Socket automatically closes?
channel.description:
[code]Process Successfully Ended, Re-Starting in 5 Seconds 'jar' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Ddsspeced Is online on port 43594 - To change this message go into server.java a nd search for 'ddsspeced is online' and change it..-Jayden Connection from 212.95.32.219:36111 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219) Connection from 89.149.214.213:43387 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) Connection from 89.149.214.213:43772 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) Connection from 212.95.32.219:36892 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9128) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:379) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:371) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:258) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:7789) at client.run(client.java:16125) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection from 89.149.214.213:44142 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) Connection from 89.149.214.213:44888 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) Connection from 212.95.32.219:39023 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219) Connection from 89.149.214.213:46392 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) Connection from 212.95.32.219:39844 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219) Connection from 89.149.214.213:46761 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:9128) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:379) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:371) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:258) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:7789) at client.run(client.java:16125) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection from 212.95.32.219:40254 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (212.95.32.219) Connection from 89.149.214.213:47135 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (89.149.214.213) [/code]
It happens frequently, and it annoys me. I tried messing with it, but no dice.

item.title: Socket automatically closes?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
